nodes.text: Allegiance 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Allegiance. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Luke Ross, and published on October 16, 2019 by Marvel Comics. The issue is part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker publishing program, and it features the story "Troubled Waters," which is set after the events of the 2017 film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi.

BEFORE THE EXCITING EVENTS OF STAR WARS: THE RISE OF SKYWALKER! Hounded by the FIRST ORDER across the galaxy, the RESISTANCE is in dire need of ships, weapons and recruits to make a final stand against KYLO REN'S forces. Desperation drives a delegation led by GENERAL LEIA ORGANA and REY to entreat the Rebel veteran's one-time allies, THE MON CALAMARI, to join the fight.
